page.title: 14The Egremont Hotel
page.content: { From the prospectus for this}Hotel. The Egremont Hotel is in the centre of this pleasant small Somerset town at the foot of the Quantock Hills. The Hotel is just one mile from the sea and is an{ideal centre}for visiting the beautiful countryside of Somerset and North Devon. It is in easy reach of the Exmoor National Park, Dunster Castle, Cheddar Gorge and many picturesque villages where history abounds. Within the area there is ample{opportunity for riding, sea {fishing, trout fishing, walking golf, {or just enjoying the countryside of {England.} A welcoming atmosphere greets you at the Egremont Hotel, our aim being high standards of cuisine and comfort. Hot and cold water in all rooms, a residents lounge with colour television, car parking for twenty cars.
